author: cbs8
title: Bonnerfied Entertainment Presents Comedy Spillage
text:
Comedy Spillage is a combined five-year-anniversary and birthday celebration.
 NEW YORK, NY, October 08, On October 18, 2015, Bonnerfied Entertainment will present a comedy event, Comedy Spillage , that celebrates both the five-year anniversary of the company and the birthdays of CEO Trevor Bonner and CSF Enterprises' Craig Foy. Comedy Spillage is presented in association with CSF Enterprises, Only One Son Entertainment and The Whole Wheat Cracker.
The event will take place at Slate, at 54 W 21st - between 5th and 6th Avenue. Comedians featured include: Ricky Gerro, Miles Green, Jared Freid, Del Harrison, Clipperman and Larry Beyah. There will also be some surprise comedic guests.
"We are proud to return to Slate, where Comedy Spillage was founded in 2010," says CEO Trevor Bonner. "Since its inception, Comedy Spillage has garnered rave reviews from both audiences and performers and has appeared at many NYC venues including Slate, BB Kings and The Broadway Comedy Club. The company has also raised awareness of the American Cancer Society, Autism and Gilda's Club."
Bonnerfied Entertainment's mission is to provide diverse entertainment through a platform of laughter, music, professionalism, and quality of performance. Bonnerfied Entertainment invites patrons to join in the red carpet celebration and become a 'Comedy Spillager' for a 'Spooktacular' Comedy Spillage event. Enjoy music with DJs Jay Wright and Kaos. Tickets can be purchased online in advance of the event. Showtime is 7:30pm, doors open 6:30pm. General admission is $25; VIP admission (including priority seating and a free drink) is $35. Costume optional. Click here to purchase tickets.
